answerText: Republic of Rwanda[10] The Tutsi genocide was committed by members of this ethnic majority of Rwanda, of which Habyarimana was a member.
heading: 2010 ACF Fall |2010 | Bellarmine and UCLA (1) | 4 | History | World | College
subject: History
question: Question: This country's first president, Gregoire Kayibanda, came to power after the Gitarama Coup. For 10 points each: [10] Name this nation in which the 1994 assassination of its president Juv√©nal Habyarimana sparked a genocide of Tutsi.
